alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 3:55PM MST until August 17 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 355 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Perryville, or 7 miles northwest of Goodyear, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Phoenix International Raceway, Palo Verde, Perryville, Luke AFB and Liberty. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 112 and 130. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 149 and 154. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 105 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
